short_description.0: The great Jewish philosopher, Abraham Heschel said, "We will not perish for want of information; but only for want of appreciation... What we lack is not a will to believe but a will to wonder..." Wonder is the feeling that overcomes us when we enter life and not just watch it.

authors.0:
Mark Nepo, Contributor
Author, New York Times bestseller ‘The Book of Awakening’
